NFT

Get started in investing

Non-fungible tokens (NFTs) are types of crypto tokens. Each of them is unique in some way and cannot be replaced or counterfeited.

BNTC NFTs confirm the ownership of tokenized versions of physical, financial, intellectual assets created and acquired in the BNT Ecosystem.

Additionally, the BNT Ecosystem uses NFTs to protect the rights of R&D developers, the BNT Ecosystem and holders of unique (collectible) NFTs with serial numbers.

BNTC NFT:

  • provides a discount on the BNT Ecosystem’s products and services;
  • confirms the ownership of unique digital assets;
  • is a collectible.

Our unique BNTC NFTs are available for purchase on our website. Holders of BNTC NFTs, regardless of functionality, will have the right to convert BNTC utility tokens to BNTC security tokens. There will be an option to play an online game and win functional BNTC NFTs.

Find out more about the NFTs you can purchase and their functionality.

Discounts on Products and Services Purchased in BNT Ecosystem Using NFTs

Gold BNTC NFT Series A01
Gold BNTC NFT is a functional non-fungible token in the BNT Ecosystem. Holders of gold BNTC NFTs are entitled to a 10 percent discount on the BNT Ecosystem's products and services. The discount is applied to the products and services amounting to 1,000–5,000 BNTC utility tokens.
Starting at
€50 per unit
Buy now

Silver BNTC NFT Series A02
Silver BNTC NFT is a functional non-fungible token in the BNT Ecosystem. Holders of silver BNTC NFTs are entitled to a 5 percent discount on the BNT Ecosystem's products and services. The discount is applied to the products and services amounting to 1,000–5,000 BNTC utility tokens.
Starting at
€25 per unit
Buy now

READ MORE

READ MORE

A certificate is an electronic document issued by the BNT Ecosystem to a BNTC NFT holder to confirm the ownership of a token providing a discount on the Ecosystem’s products and services or performing any other function determined in the BNT Ecosystem. A smart contract contains information about the certificate. A specific function in accordance with the series and number of the BNTС NFT is published on the official website of the BNT Ecosystem. BNTC NFT holders are entitled to a discount, which is confirmed by the certificate: 10% off – for holders of gold BNTC NFTs and 5% off – for holders of silver BNTC NFTs.

In 2023, we plan to put 500,000 BNTC NFTs into circulation. Each NFT will have a series of alphanumeric characters (for example, E00, R00, OS0) and a five-digit consecutive number (starting with 00001).

BNTC NFTs that are available for purchase on the Enjin Marketplace:

Series E01

  • Number
    E01-00001 - E01-00050

Series E02

  • Number
    E02-00001 - E02-00050
